values:
Well, I'm back. I haven't been doing much lately. I've been doing lots of stuff so ya know I don't have much to report.
I met a guy today named Mark. He's really cool and nice, and I think he's just great. He and I share some ideas and stuff. I'm really tired now so yeah. I seem really disjointed when I type right now. I'm just happy I've met him. It was fun. So yeah.
A funny thing is that I now, yet again, have a crush on Jesse McCartney again. I think it's cuz I can relate with some of his material. And, I'm partial to blondes. So yeah. It's sorta annoying ya know. Cuz you fall in love with people you just can't have or don't like you. I just hate it.
But, as I've said on MySpace, I've given up on the game of love for a while. Maybe I'll find someone once I quit completely. Being a constant hopeless romantic is just like cigarettes, so addictive you have to ween yourself of it. Anyway. I've commited myself to fantasy and fiction for probably the next year. It's a good escape from the world of guys I can't have and want.
So anyway. Uhhhh...
Yeah. I'll write later when I'm not so ADD-ish.

~*Scarlette*~
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/11851.html

Hi. My friends(Namely PlaidedBra and JFM(not currently member)) have helped me decide to comeback to livejournal. I'm gonna keep up some drafts of my many works. You have probably heard of most of them.
My most recent is of a man who kills himself and it becomes a murder case involving all the people around him. It's kinda odd but I'll make sense later.
Gotta go. ttyl.

Zaijian,
Scarlet
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/11545.html

Hey peeps! I've got an announcement. On Sunday, April 23, 2006, I will become a Christian Witch. I really can't wait to become one. I think this is the best path for me. But anyway. That's all I had to say right now. Talk to ya'll later. Bye.
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/11297.html

Here is Skorn by Ra, sung as a duet.


Thaxy: You were the one who'd never leave
Me: Beautiful eyes, you seemed so free
    Touching your face I felt complete
Thaxy: Holding your hand my heart would weep

Me: So everything that came out of your mouth was full of lies
    You looked me right dead in the eyes
Thaxy: You'd call your girlfriends and tell them that I abused your trust
       You did your best to demonize

(Chorus is same as before.)
You were the one who'd never leave
Beautiful eyes, you seemed so free
Touching your face I felt complete
Holding your hand my heart would weep

Me: You were the one who raped my soul
    Beautiful lies, you stole my hope
    Touching your ass, I scratch the skin
    Holding your neck, I tie the rope...
   (Pulling it tight)

You were the one who'd never leave
Beautiful eyes, you seemed so free
Touching your face I felt complete
Holding your hand my heart would weep

Me: You were the one, the one for me
    Now that you're gone it's hard to see
    So much of me has gone away
    There's no need to stay another day
    (But someone's got to pay)

Okay so most of it was me, but there were some lines I thought Thaxy should sing. Anyway. Not much new here. See yall.
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/11026.html

I feel so special. This guy that I've had a crush on since eighth grade, I found him on myspace. YAY!!!!!!!!!!!! I have a myspace. It's Scarlet DeGondea. Anyway. Talk to ya later.

BTW, I found two songs for Thaxy and me. Skorn-Ra. Adrienne-The Calling. Check em out. I'll have a diagram of Skorn later.
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/10965.html

I forgot to tell ya'll the craziest new that I have ever heard. The Thursday before last two kids were found fornicating in the girl's bathroom at school. That is crazy. I mean, I've heard of having sex on school campus, but I've never heard of it happening during school before.
Anyway. I wanna write a digimon saga with my friends and I in it. I'm getting ideas and stuff for it. My friend, Anna, and my sister are going to be included. It's gonna be awsome. So, yeah.
Anyway. My friend, Ross and I are going to have a RPG group started in a little while. We gotta get together soon and figure out what's happening. I think it's gonna be D20, but what ever it is, I think I'm gonna be DM.
Anyway. Yeah. I think that's all.
Love ya'll. Bye.
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/10506.html

Derek, my ex-boyfriend, is an asshole. He has lied to me and I'm sick of it. He is appearently going out with one of my "best friends" now. He still hasn't given me a reason as to why he broke up with me, but I'm gonna get to the bottom of this. I'm pissed at them both. It hurts so much.
Now, I am no longer going to normal school. I am going to be tutored at UMM for 2 hours a day. My teachers didn't think I was emotionally safe at school so they got me tutors for the rest of the school year. I'm still going to UB tho, so that's great.
I can't wait to get to college. You couldn't hold me down from going if you wanted to.
Anyway. TTYL! Bye.
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/10468.html

Derek broke up with me last Sunday. That's my bad news. It hurts even still but anyway. Yeah. I went to a concert last night. It was Ra. Ra rocks so much. They kick ass. Anyway. Tired. Talk later.

http://www.raband.com
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/10132.html

Heyla!!!!! I'm back. And lots of things have changed.
Derek and I are still going out tho, so that's good.
I got a haircut. I wanted to look like Irma from W.I.T.C.H, but I don't look much like her. People love it tho so atleast I'm not at a total loss.
I have a website now. It's at scarletdegondea.cjb.net. I'm uploading all my crap as we speak. But, yeah.
I've started new classes. Spanish, English, and Women Writers. Yippee! I'm also now an alto in chorus so yeah. I fear I'll never get used to those low notes. I'm gonna miss being a soprano.
Anyway......I think I had more to say but I can't think of anything I'll write more later.

Peace Out,
Scarlet DeGondea
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/9782.html

Yes, I tell you true. Derek and I have been going out a year at 9pm tomorrow night. Holy Crap!!!!!!!! Anyway. *smiles* I love him. Anyway
Your Dating Purity Score: 85%
You are an innocent dater. You're either lacking in dating experience or have had a long serious relationship. Either way, there's still plenty of fish in the sea out there for you to sample!
Dating Purity Test
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/9655.html

Christmas!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Yay!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! One Week!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Yay!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Anyway! I'm happy! I've got Derek!!!!!!!!! Yay!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
There's a dance tonight!!!!!!!!! Yay!!!!!!!!!
I don't know what the hell else to say!!!!!! Yay!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Anyway. Ttyl!!!!!!!!!!

Peace,
Kitty Kat
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/9386.html

Yeah, You heard me right. My seemingly friends dissed me for no good reason. It's really been hard on me. I mean, what's the point in trusting people when they seemingly befriend you and then diss you. The insanely sad thing is my boyfriend isn't standing up for me and most of my friends who dissed me were his best friends. He said, "They probably didn't want to offend me bcuz ur my girlfriend." He should have been offended in the first place. and now it's harder to get in touch with Derek than the fucking pope. I'm on leave from school for emotional issues and he doesn't even care that I wanna talk to him. It's really sad. Anyway. Maybe I should try him again.
Anyway. Yeah, now I'm 18. Whatever. Not too happy because of recent events. i will be later. Til then, keep rocking on compadres.

Peace,
Kitty Kat
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/9104.html

Yep! It's one more day before my birthday. Yay! I'm happy.
Over the weekend, I went to a Upward Bound Rally. I got to see half of my friends from there. It was fun. What wasn't fun though was James and I were sick the whole time. James W. is one of my friends from UB. We've got about the same dirtiness of mind and both come from the same state. We know what each other are talking about. Anyway. I met this guy at the rally by the nickname of "Lackey" and he was cool. If you read this Lackey e-mail me.
Anyway. Not much more to report will report later.

Peace,
Kitty Kat
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/8838.html

It is 13 days til I turn 18. *gleefulness joy and sugary gleeness* Yay!!!!!!!!! I'm happy. I've been depressed lately and crap but now, I'm happy. My eyeballs just hurt. I crap you not.
Anyway. I wanna change my icon damnit!!!!!!!!!! Oh, well. I'm on Derek's computer and he's playing a game, but yeah. I'll try to make an icon and put it up. I've got a porta portal with avatar crap on it. Anyway. Nothing more to report. Love and peace ya'll.

Peace,
Kitty Kat
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/8473.html

Heyla! I'm back! Anyway. I'm tired bcuz I was up late finishing Chemistry work and had to get up early. *Growl* Now I'm stuck afterschool for a few hours with no snack. *grrrrrr grrrrr* Anyway. Derek is fine. I shared a bunch of peach pieces with him at lunch. Hope he comes back for play practice and brings me a snack. Not that he'd think of me. Anyway. I saw Flight Plan on Saturday. Good movie! I wrote an awsome song today called Snowman Sweetheart, bcuz of a song in chorus today.
I've got so many different ideas for stories. It's insane. *Plasters huge banner on the wall.* COMING SOON: CINDY ELLA AND OTHER STORIES BY SCARLET DEGONDEA Check out www.fictionpress.com, under Scarlet DeGondea.
Anyway. Can't think of much more to report.

Peace,
Kitty Kat
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/8367.html

Heyla! I'm back. I'm happy but stressed and such. School is annoying. I'm hoping I can get back on track with school and such.
I've come up with a new story. Cindy Ella. Sorta a A Cinderella Story twist on a Dragon Time version of the lovely Cinderella. I will tell more but it's almost bed time.

Peace,
Kitty Kat
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/7974.html

I know you're all happy to see me again. Not! Anyway. D+D starts on Sunday. YAY!!!!!!!!! Tired and haven't gotten any sleep.
I think my new D+D character is gonna be named Drisana or Saundralyn or Darsi......I dunno.....Derek's about to help me with that.

Anyway. Talk to you later.

Peace,
Kitty Kat
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/7920.html

Just felt like updating.....
School starts on Wednesday. My bad. Anyway. ttyl.

Peace Out,
Kitty Kat
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/7607.html

Heyla Ya'll!!!!!!
It's been 8 months with Derek! Yea!!!!!!!!!!! I just got talked to him on the internet and when he got off I realized it. *bangs head becuz of dorkyness*
Anyway. Damn lice are gone!!!!!! Yea!!!!!!!!!!!!! I can start living life again.
Anyway! I'm going with Derek and his family to the fair this weekend. That's gonna be fun. I can't wait to see him. On Saturday, it'll be two weeks. *ugh.*
Anyway school starts on Thursday but I've got my early college class on Tuesday.....Yea!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Anyway.........ttyl.

Peace,
Kitty Kat
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/7400.html

I'm bored. I miss Derek mucho mucho much. I am talking to my friend, Caleb on IM and he's great. He told me he hopes I get better from my damn lice. *yay* anyway.
I'm tired and think I'm gonna go to sleep extremely soon.

Peace,
Kitty Kat
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/7134.html

Heyla Ya'll! Sup?
Lots are happening to me. I have a horrible case of head lice and it's driving me insane. I didn't get enough sleep the first night I knew I had them. I have to sleep in our guest room and it's hard sleeping on that bed somehow. Derek pretty left on a trip without telling me it was confirmed to happen. I found out from his brother. And he doesn't seem to care that I have lice and it's killing. Of course, I guess he doesn't know, but it's annoying me that he probably doesn't and won't care.
I don't mean to sound like the clingy girlfriend; look at all aspects of our relationship before judging me. Maybe I am, but Derek doesn't seem to want to tell me the truth if I am.
Anyway. I'm going to orientation for early college classes on Monday and probably starting my class on Tuesday. I'm hoping to have a sleepover with my best friend(locally) and then going to a fair with her, her boyfriend, and Derek(as well as both his and my friends family) at the end of this week.
I think that's about all. Oh yeah. I got a haircut. It goes to my shoulders. It's cool.

Anyway. See ya'll later.

Peace,
Kitty Kat
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/6658.html

Heyla! I'm just updating cuz, wel, why the hell not.
Anyway. I'm helping Derek with a story and I've been hearing music that could go with the story. Yeah. Pretty much about it.

Countdowns:

Blue Hill Fair: About 10 or 11 Days

Orientation: 13 Days

School Starts: 22 Days

Eight Months: 15 Days

Peace,
Kitty Kat
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/6451.html

Hey what's up? not very much here....just felt like dropping in. Derek is really sweet, I just have to say. he send me an e-mail chain thing that I sent him and everything that had to do with me was just sweet.
Anyway. I'm getting in hard rock music. I've been listening to Tenacious D(who rock my fucking socks off.) and to the rock greats. Korn. Metallica. KSE. Disturbed. Steve Vai. Etc. It's fun.

Anyway. Not much else. I feel sick and have been for a few days. Anyway.

ttyl.

Peace,
Kitty Kat
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/6288.html

Heyla! I finally got back on the internet. Well, nothing really to talk about.
I just noticed that most of my new story ideas have to do with suicide. My most recent idea being about a girl who commits suicide while her boyfriend(who loves her very much) is on vacation and all she left behind is a poem. She was a poet and so her boyfriend tries to decifer what it means and finds out unknown things about his girlfriend. That's my recent idea. I think it'll be something of a vingette(short novel). Oh well. Check out any crap I write on Fictionpress.com under Scarlet DeGondea. Please review my work. I don't care if it's a flame or not. Anything works.
I love the movie Brave New Girl. The music rocks on it. Anyway.
A song that makes me really happy now is Tidal Wave by Skye Sweetnam. I've been acting weird and that song has always picked me up when I'm down.
Oh, BTW, check out Thorvald Umberland on FP.com cuz that's Derek and he rocks. Naturally.

Anyway, not much else to say. Keep on rocking.

Peace,
Kitty Kat
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/6065.html

There are only 2 more days of UB! I'm mixed. I'm so exhausted and want to go home and at the same time don't wanna leave. Anyway. I've gotta write notes. I'm behind. Anyway. Cruise tonight. WWWWWHHHHHHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Anyway. I'll write later, I'm in English.

Peace Out,
Kitty Kat
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/5638.html

Heyla! It's me. I'm at a talent show right now. I sang "Feels Like Falling"-Jump5. Everyone loved it, even though I seriously screwed up in the middle. I'm soon going to be dancing to "Bounce"-(I dunno who does it.) It's fun, but I don't know much of the song. Anyway. Not much to report. Derek and I are still happily steady. UB is over in a week. Boston tomorrow. I've gotta do my laundry. Hmmmmmmm.......That's almost all I can think off right now. Seeya.

Peace,
Kitty Kat




"You flip my pancakes."
             -Derek

(Had to put it. It's just so cute. Love ya, Derek.
Peace, Kitty Kat)
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/5596.html

Heyla ya'll. I am having fun. UB is rockin'!
I just got out of WBOR with my boyfriend. I helped him with his show. He asked for it of course. I would not trample this work with out his permission.(or would I? ELOL)
Anyway, 2 days til Friends and Family Day! I can't wait........*jumps around in frustration in her head* RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR! Anyway.
Keep Rockng On!!!

Peace,
Kitty Kat


Mood:*Overwhelmed by forces beyond my control*
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/5370.html

Heyla ya'll. It's focus week and I'm doing Creative Writing. It's fun.
I was stuck in a car all weekend and touring Vermont. I also found out that one of mine and Derek's friends is on LiveJournal. Dwezel! You rock! Anyway. Yeah. I don't know what else to say so ttyl.

Kitty Kat
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/5039.html

Heyla. It's me again. I have had a good weekend. Friday, I recieved a position of co-host of a radio show, Derek and I had been going out for six months and we saw Anchorman! It rocked my world. Saturday, I went to a Seadogs Game. Not that I'm a fan of baseball....Sunday, I went hiking. Yesterday, there was a dance. Today, I got an e-mail from a poet I worked with in sixth grade(I e-mailed him first.) I'm overjoyed.

Top Things That Rock My World
1.) Derek
2.) Shrek in Spanish
3.) James' new word: Pornify(did I spell it right?)
4.) BJ Ward
5.) Getting an e-mail from BJ Ward
6.) Dance
7.) My Radio Show(with Brandon)
8.) My Music
9.) The Word Of The Day
10.) Perverted Humor

God knows why! Anyway. TTYL! Seeya.

Peace,
Kitty Kat
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/4679.html

It is one more day before Derek and I have been going out for a half of a year. I'm so happy. It feels great to be me right now. I love you Derek.
Anyway. Almost 2nd weekend of UB! It's gonna be fun as all. Anchorman is playing tomorrow night, Seadogs game Saturday and god know's what's up with Sunday. It's gonna be so much fun.
I'm postponing my Rock-My-World list. I don't feel like writing it, because it isn't ready yet.

Oh. It anyone who reads this is my friend, listen to WBOR 91.1, Tuesdays from 3-4, Wednesdays from 2-3, and Thursday from 3-4, because this is when my friends are on. Order is Chris, Lori, Derek. Gotta advertize. Anyway.

I'm gonna go so seeya later.

Peace,
Kitty Kat
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/4533.html

Heyla! I'm back. Not much has been going on since last time I wrote. I got a horrid sunburn and yesterday was THE worst day of the summer. My UB friend, Lori and I were feeling sick, as was Megan(in my dorm.) and Melissa sprained her ankle(of which sucks most of all.) and Derek lost some of his stuff. It just sucked so much.
Anyway. Next time I update. I will have a list of things that rock my world. I have been saying that way too much lately, so I'm gonna make a top ten list every update or every week. Anyway.

G2G. Seeya! Rock on!

Peace,
Kitty Kat
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/4166.html

Heyla Ya'll! It's me again. I'm at UB! Yay! It's rocks my existence. Anyway.
I just checked my e-mail and I got an e-mail for writing contests. I think I'm gonna do the one for a character's day. I'm gonna write a day about my D20 modern character, Chandelle Montague. She is a chaplin from the convent at the Notre Dame cathedral. She is with these people as a symbol of god or something of the like. Anyway. Yeah.

I'm gonna go now, cuz there's not much else to report. Seeyas. Rock on and Rock hard!

Peace,
Kitty Kat
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/3867.html

Heyla. I'm back.

Countdowns:

UB:6 days

HP book:1 month and 3 days

Half-a-year:17 days

End of school:1 full day(2 half-days)

Anyway. This will probably be my last entry before attending UB. Nothing much has been going on around her. I hope more will happen in the next month and a half.
Tomorrow is finals and so is Wednesday. Then, no school. Yay.
I'll see ya'll on the flip side.

Peace,
Scarlet
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/3678.html

Heyla!
Not much has happened since.....what was is? Thursday? Anyway. I went shopping with Derek and his family yesterday. It rocked. My parents were out all day and said I could spend time with him. When I got home, I saw a Eurovan in the driveway. It rocks my socks off. I spent half-the-day cleaning most of it.
Anyway. ttyl.

Peace,
Dreamer
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/3370.html

Heyla Peeps. Two days of sun so far! *brightens up and starts to dance around* Thank you god! My day is most likely going to rock. Now, if you could only discard a viral cold.*blahk* I sound absolutely horrible and my throat hurt. I started coughing in the hall this morning and my brother's friend's mom(who is a long term sub) asked me if I was alright. She was walking out of the library and I was walking in.
Anyway. One day late. HAPPY FIVE MONTHS!!!!!!!!!!!! YAY!!!!!!!!!!
No school tomorrow because of Graduation. Yay!
Oh, if Caleb sees this before I talk to him next, Happy Four Months, dude!!!!!!!!!!!!
Oh, and if Ammie and Caleb see this anytime soon, e-mail me. I've got something to ask you and junk so I want you to let me know you saw this. Caleb's heard of it but I just gotta hear somethings from you guys and inform you. Anyway. Felt like writing it.
Anyway. I'm in school and cannot think of much else to say. ttyl.

Peace,
*Dreamer*
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/3258.html

Heyla. Sup peeps. It is Friday May 27 2005, and the weather has been gloomy forever. Almost all month. I've been depressed and all that during the month of May. I think it's because of the weather. I hope it ends soon.
Anyway. Prom rocked! Everything was awsome that night.
Also, I'm trying to create a soundtrack for myself, Star Glitter, and Celestina Whifarie, my D+D character. They are still in progress. I'm just into music now.
Also, I'm gonna be working on a story at Upward Bound. It's called Ignite about a suicidal pyromaniac named Darsi Bell, who tries to kill herself by flame, but lives and learns how great life really is. This idea came out of nowhere while I was lying on my mom's bed. I'm on the second chapter but I'm copying the story into another notebook so I can write it in one place at UB. I think I'll work on a soundtrack for it so I can listen to the music while I write.
Yay! Plans are so much fun. I can't wait for UB. It's gonna rock.
Just in case I don't get back to my journal before this, five months Wednesday. *grins* Yay!
It's almost the end of school. Yay and nay! Make-up work!*fades* Vacation and UB *grins and brightens up* End of the year stress. Oh well, it'll be over soon.
Anyway. I'm in school and it's almost time to change class. Seeya'll later.

Peace Out,
Dreamer
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/2848.html

TONIGHT IS PROM!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Rock on! I'm so excited. I'm gonna look sorta like a darker form of Cinderella and it's gonna rock hard. I'm getting a ride from my friend Julie and we're picking up Derek and taking him with us.
I was kinda upset yesterday because I had to miss D+D. I had to go shopping for prom stuffins. I found out this morning that I was sorta forgotten about so oh well. I can't wait for the next meeting.
I'm finally up on the internet. YAY. It's like the first time in 3 weeks. Last time I was on, I didn't update. I forgot about it.
Anyway. I got accepted to Upward Bound so I'm thrilled. I can't wait. It'll be so much fun.
I can't think of much more to report so I'll talk to yas later.

Peace,
*Dreamer*
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/2676.html

Heyla! Sup ya'll?
I got sick and was out of school for 2 days. I haven't taken anyway days off of school this year. It was boring as all. Both of my best friends told me never to miss school again, because it was boring without me. That was the most interesting thing to happen to me all week. Tuesday I was over Derek's house before the Ice Cream Social concert I had to be at. That also happened.
Tomorrow is Easter! Yay!!!!!!!!!!! Candy all around! Gotta love the holiday. It caught most of my friends off guard though. I think it's because it's usually in April. Anyway.
I have new theme song. I consider it my theme song anyway. Beautiful Dreamer by Stephen Foster. Derek was singing part of it to me, because that is my D+D nickname of which he chose for me. So, I've adpoted it as my theme song. Anyway.

BCU(Be Seeing You)

Peace Out,
*Dreamer*
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/2420.html

Heyla. Just me again. I'm stuck at school on a half-day because my mom doesn't want to drive me back and forth to school twice today. It's my dad's birthday today anyway.(: HAPPY BIRTHDAY DADDY!

Anyway. I am stuck after school everyday this week. Destination Imagination regional competions are this Saturday. We're having practice almost everyday now. Atleast I get to stay for play practice on top of that.(: It's funny to watch/listen to the lines in this play. "Darling, I think I can handle the deranged man with a fork." It's just awsome.

Anyway. That's all I can think to say right now. ttyl. seeyas.

Peace Out,
*Dreamer*
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/2299.html

Heyla! Not much is up. Mid-Winter recess was this week. Somewhat fun, somewhat boring. Oh well. It's over and it's gonna really suck when we get back to school. *Bah* oh well. I'm hoping maybe Derek and I got a part in the school play. On Valentine's Day, we stayed after school to audition for it. yeah. anyway. I gotta get my Upward Bound stuff finished. I can't wait til it starts. I hope I get picked. Anyway. Just got WinMX. I love it. Anyway. can't think of much else to say. ttyl.

Peace,
Katy
*Dreamer*
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/1939.html

Heyla y'all. It's 2 days til Valentine's Day. I can't wait. It's gonna be fun. I'll be able to be with Derek.*:D*
I hope to have my website up soon. I've been working on it for a while. It's gonna have writing, art, D+D stuffins, my fandom(stuff I'm a fan of(mostly actors and characters)), links and junk, and song stuffins I have. I can't wait to get it up. It'll be awsome.
Well, the last two day's I've had no school whatsoever. Snow days. *Ugh* I wanted to go with Derek to a dance today. I think he was looking forward to it too.(If you read this Derek, I really don't know which you wanted more.)
Anyway. I can't think of much more to say. I'll update this whole thing later anyway.(Like in a few days.)

Peace Out,
Katy
*Dreamer*
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/1705.html

Heyla
It's Friday. TGIF!
Tomorrow I attend my first Dungeon and Dragons meeting. That is since I moved. I moved to my present location 2 years tomorrow. WOW! How time does fly.
I can't wait for 11 o'clock to roll around. I mean tomorrow. I'll see Derek at that time. Derek is my boyfriend. He's also in D+D so I see him there.
Okay. I've decided to change this so that people who know me can understand. My name is Katy. If you know me, you know the rest of the info.
Anyway. 5 weeks tomorrow. or today. I dunno how you count. Oh well. 5 weeks all the same.

I dunno what else to say so ttyl.

Love and Peace,
Katy
aka: Scarlet Glitter

P.S: Here is a few lines from a song that reminds me of Derek.

*When I feel like a freak,
The words you say,
Tell me to believe that I'm okay,
When I don't make sense cause I'm this way,
You see the best in me,*
-"In My Heart"-Jump5
http://scarletglitter.livejournal.com/1422.html

Heyla. I was bored and wanted to update this. 3 weeks today. Yea!
Last time I was here, it was down. Oh well. Not much more. I'm really sleepy. Started new classes this week and loving most of them. I could live without the more boring than heck study halls, but hey when work is due, it's nice to be able to do it there.
I'm going now. Too sleepy. Seeya.

~*Scarlet Glitter*~

Heyla! I am Scarlet Glitter if you haven't already figured that out. To find out more about me, check my stats.

Well, Christmas just passed. I celebrate that holiday.(no offense to those who celebrate differently.) I got "South Park-Bigger, Longer, and Uncut" for one. It has to be the most screwed up movie I've seen in my entire life. But, it's the funniest thing in the world. It's cool how those stories work out. And Kenny is just the cutest thing. *aaawwwwww* People might think I'm weird for thinking that show makes sense most of the time but it does. Gotta love Matt Stone and Trey Parker. They've got some really screwed up minds, but they're awsome. I'm still expecting presents, too. I just love it. But anyway.

Nothing really has happened since then. Just watching "South Park", "Big Fish", and "Oliver and Co.".
*I'm thuper, thanks for asking,* *What would Brian Brontono Do if he were here today, I'm sure he'd kick an a$$ or two, that's what Brian Brontono'd do!* *There's the girl that I like*
Yes all these songs were from "South Park", but most of them are stuck in my head. I especially love, "Wendy's Song"(poor Stan), but that Brian Brontono song is in my head most of the time, or "I'm Super".

Anyway, I will retire now. Til next time. Adios Amigos!

Peace and Love!
